name: The Four Hooved Working Horse
description:
Your a young working horse, you have magical elemental hooves, your born on random planets, the main goal of the game is to work and get the highest total score you can get. 

You must live till old age and upgrade your hooves, in this silly game you may kick the odd chicken but have no worries their feathers make your tired achy heavy hooves feel lighter and better, you must eat now and then.

Be sure to have a good tail as your tail is what is gonna save you from meteors, I mean don't ask me why but it is the way of life. If your alignment is true then enjoy the benefits, but game doesn't change too much if your not aligned.

Hay is your money, Neighs are another resource aka experience, together they are used to help upgrade. Happy gaming and hopefully nothing unexpected happens during your play. 

This is incomplete work and is a demo, so past lives has nothing to do with mechanics yet. Nor can this game save yet. However I will work on the paid version and add those features and some more in days to come.
